title: Striped T-Shirts for the Whole Family Are Up to 63 Percent Off at J.Crew
text:
19 items in this article 18 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the retailer

September has been a big month for stripes here at the Strategist. As senior editor Simone Kitchens (who wrote about her new stripes in the latest edition of the Strategist Haul) noted, we went deep both in print and online on the pattern’s enduring appeal. Today, we close out the month by going even deeper — specifically, into the bowels of J.Crew’s website, where a bunch of striped tees for women, men, and kids are up to 63 percent off amid the retailer’s 5 Days of Deals Event (during which certain new items are 30 percent off, and other on-sale items are eligible for an additional 30 percent off). The striped T-shirts we found deals on today include versatile long-sleeved styles that would look great on their own or under a fall jacket or cardigan, as well as some short-sleeved tees you can layer much the same way (anyone who lives or works in a space where you can’t control the heat knows short sleeves can be necessary even in winter). Note: Some of the shirts require entering the code MONDAY at checkout to get the full discount; we’ve noted exactly which on the list below. And because J.Crew promises new things for each Day of Deals, we think these prices won’t last long and suggest acting fast on anything you like (some styles already are not stocked in full sizes).

description: As part of J.Crew’s online 5 Days of Deals sale event, long-sleeved and short-sleeved striped T-shirts for men, women, and kids are up to 63 percent off. We pulled our favorite styles, which include classic nautical stripes and bolder colors.
